evs.description: Certificate from a psychiatrist indicating the mental health condition of the applicant.

evs.description: Statutory declaration under Law 1599/86 of the applicant stating that they do not fall under the prohibitions of Article 18 of Law 2168/1993 and that they are not a fugitive from justice.

criterion_requirments.name: The applicant must be at least 18 years old.
The applicant must not suffer from or have been hospitalized for major mental disorders or severe personality disorders.

The applicant must not have been irrevocably convicted of: (a) any misdemeanor prosecuted ex officio and committed intentionally, for which a sentence of at least 2 years' imprisonment was imposed; (b) any misdemeanor under the provisions of Laws 2168/93 and 3500/2006. Additionally, no criminal prosecution must have been initiated against them for: (a) acts punishable as felonies, (b) violations of drug and organized crime laws, (c) acts of terrorism, (d) violations involving explosive or toxic substances, or (e) violations under Article 15 of Law 2168/93.
The applicant must be a national of an EU member state residing or temporarily staying in Greece.
The license is granted only for revolvers or pistols of Category B under Annex I of Law 2168/1993.
